DOC.brief_title: Animal Allergy Korean Pet Owners , Pet-related Industry Workers , Laboratory Animal Reseachers
DOC.detailed_description: We enrol participant international symposium Korean association laboratory science ( laboratory animal researcher ) companion animal exhibition ( pet owner pet-related industry worker ) inform consent . They ask response questionnaire regard age , gender , comorbid allergic disease , family history allergy , contact animal , time amount exposure , allergic symptom severity duration exposure animal . They underwent skin prick test animal allergen inhalant allergen .
DOC.criteria: Participants international symposium Korean association laboratory science companion animal exhibition inform consent obtain . Subjects reject enrollment study .
